spec:
fix the circleci script
the publish to jitpack task is generating artefacts with the git commit hash instead of the version number
i.e. 	         'com.github.incept5:correlation:c888652ff8ef9d18cc25601a3475921f72d0497b'
instead of
	         'com.github.incept5:correlation:1.0.4'
commitMessage:
Fix JitPack artifact versioning to use version number instead of commit hash

1. Updated CircleCI config to create and push git tags with version numbers
2. Modified jitpack.yml to extract version from git tags
3. Updated build.gradle.kts to handle version and group parameters correctly
4. Ensured a valid group ID is always used during builds
